name: Etrip
overview:
Etrip.com.cn is the online travel service platform operated by the professional operation team from the China Oriental Dream International Travel Service. China Oriental Dream is owned by the China Tourism University.

License No. : L-ZY-GJ00046

Since 1994, China Oriental Dream is one of ChinaÂ¡Â¯s leading travel agencies and tour operators. With extensive experience in the tourism industry, the China Oriental Dream team of professionals has everything it takes to meet your needs, your dream. Our multi-talented team takes a customized approach to every project and offers every customer a high degree of personal attention.

We are committed to providing you with practical and creative solutions that will make any trip an unforgettable success for your group (small and large), your company or your organization.

Dedicated to meeting your trip expectations, we offer a wide variety of tailor-made trips, based on the clients interests or professional concerns and objectives, as follows:
